狿狿狿

狿字的基本解释

狿
yán
古书上说的一种似狸而身体较长的野兽。

狿字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yán］
［《廣韻》以然切，平仙，以。］
［《廣韻》予線切，去線，以。］
(1)兽名。
(2)见“獌狿”。

狿字的康熙字典解释

【巳集下】【犬字部】　狿； 康熙笔画：11； 页码：页712第05
【廣韻】以然切【集韻】夷然切，?音延。【玉篇】獸名。【廣韻】獌狿，大獸，長八尺。【集韻】似狸而長，或作蜒。【史記·司馬相如傳】窮奇獌狿。【揚雄·校獵賦】斮巨狿。　又【玉篇】丑延切【集韻】抽延切，?音脠。又【廣韻】于線切【集韻】延面切，?音衍。義?同。

狿字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
狿字的起名意思

暂无。

Gao
Basic explanation of words
Gao
yán
An ancient beast with a long body like a raccoon dog.
Gao
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yán］
["Guangyun" Yiran cut, Pingxian, with. ]
["Guangyun" cut to the thread, remove the thread, and take. ]
(1) The animal name.
(2) See "獌狿".
Gao
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Si Ji 2] [Dog Character Department] 　狿; Kangxi strokes: 11; Page number: page 712 05
[Guang Yun] Cut Yi Ran [Ji Yun] Cut at ease,? Sound extension. 【Jade articles】The name of the beast. [Guang Yun] Qiangui, a big beast, eight feet long. 【Ji Yun】Long like a raccoon, or snaking. [Historical Records · Sima Xiangru Biography] Poor and strange 獌狿. 【Yang Xiong·School Hunting Fu】Chuju.　[Jade Chapter] Ugly Yanqie [Jiyun] Pumping Yanqi,? Sound. Also [Guang Yun] cut to the line [Ji Yun] to cut the surface,? Yin Yan. Righteous? Same.
